response.overview: Five-thousand-year-old vampire Miriam promises her lovers the gift of eternal life. When John, her cellist companion for centuries, discovers that he has suddenly begun growing old, he attempts to seek out the help of Dr. Sarah Roberts, a researcher on the mechanisms of aging.
response.title: The Hunger

release_dates.note: Rio de Janeiro International Film Festival
Fantasmagoría - Festival de Cine Fantástico y de Terror de Medellín
